articles.title: US lawmakers advance bill that could sanction South Africa over its foreign policy
articles.summary:
📰 정책, 법률, 정치 관련 뉴스
📢 US lawmakers advance bill that could sanction South Africa over its foreign poli...
articles.content: Find out what’s new on ST website and app. FILE PHOTO: Golfer Ernie Els speaks in the Oval Office during a meeting between U.S. President Donald Trump and South African President Cyril Ramaphosa, at the White House in Washington, D.C., U.S., May 21, 2025. REUTERS/Kevin Lamarque/File Photo. JOHANNESBURG - United States lawmakers have voted to advance a bill that proposes reviewing the U.S. relationship with South Africa due to objections over its foreign policy and potentially imposing sanctions on South African officials. Many bills at this stage never go to a vote. However, the committee's approval took the bill a step further and underscored tensions...

articles.title: Ozzy Osbourne’s Final Reported Photo Before His Death Is Heartbreaking
articles.summary:
📰 보건, 취업, 기술 관련 뉴스
📢 Ozzy Osbourne’s Final Reported Photo Before His Death Is Heartbreaking
articles.content: Ozzy Osbourne’s Final Reported Photo Before His Death Is Heartbreaking originally appeared on Parade. The Black Sabbath frontman passed away on Tuesday, July 22, after a long battle with Parkinson’s disease. Ozzy’s wife, Sharon Osbourne, spoke ahead of the show about his determination to perform despite his declining health. “Ozzy's working with his therapist every single day. He’s doing really well, actually,” she reportedly said at the time
